coherence_artifact.answer:
# Summary
This coherence run audits the repo artifacts for the orthodox qubit anchor: Lean sources plus UCC coverage outputs.

# Assumptions
Orthodox qubit anchor; no new physics claims. Audit is structural/traceability proxy.

# Limitations
Coherence audit does not execute Lean; it audits references and UCC outputs.

# Uncertainty
Rerun if Lean files or coverage module changes.

# Disclosure
Research scaffold only. Report issues via GitHub.

# Results
Quantum anchor coverage emits a report and audit bundle proving required theorem anchors are tracked.

claims.text: Quantum anchor coverage reports required sections present (coverage checklist/report).
Lean Pauli file anchors commutator and σx eigenstate lemmas.
Thermal/Gibbs normalization is anchored by Lean thermal file and the UCC coverage report.

items.description: Coherence metrics are proxies; not a truth guarantee.

exceptions.process: Document exception, assign acceptor, set expiry, review on cadence.
